vidis.data.mod
Interface IUserNode

All Superinterfaces:
IUserComponent
All Known Implementing Classes:
AUserNode, BullyElectionAlgorithmNode, DemoNode, FloodNode, VarTestNode, VectorClockAlgorithmNode
public interface IUserNode
extends IUserComponent

the interface for a module node; please keep in mind that you should use the abstract class AUserNode to implement new modules. there we implemented basic functionality in order to let the simulator work flawlessly together with the module.

Author:
Dominik
See Also:
AUserNode
